meanings.definition: Resembling gum in texture or consistency.
meanings.sent1: The sticky substance was so gumlike that it was hard to remove from my fingers.
meanings.sent2: The candy had a gumlike texture that made it chewy and enjoyable.
meanings.sent3: The gumlike glue held the pieces together so well that even a strong wind couldn't separate them.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as gumlike as her personality, always sticking around and bringing joy.
meanings.sent5: The gumlike material stretched and twisted like taffy, showing its flexibility.

meanings.definition: Having the characteristics or qualities of gum.
meanings.sent1: The gumlike substance was elastic and could be stretched easily.
meanings.sent2: His behavior was so gumlike, always sticking to the same routine every day.
meanings.sent3: The gumlike consistency of the pudding made it fun to play with before eating.
meanings.sent4: Her words were as gumlike as her actions, always sweet and comforting.
meanings.sent5: The gumlike material could be molded into different shapes, just like clay.
